Fri, 05 Jan 2024 16:00:00 +0000 A new game plan under Mayor Wayne Brown is likely to conclude that Eden Park will stay on as the premier venue for All Blacks tests, big events like last this year’s successful Fifa Women’s Football Cup, and concerts.
